name: Powerplay Hockey: USA vs. USSR
overview: Powerplay Hockey is a ice hockey game concentrating on the game between the USA and the USSR. Before starting the game you are to choose the number of players (on-on-one or five-on-five) and length of match (two, twelve or twenty minutes per period). When in the game try wrist shots, slap shots, face off, drop passing, and body checking. Roughing and crosschecking will give you a penalty.
